entry.title: Limited Edition Mini Cylindrical Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mini Cylindrical 16"
Price: 55.00

Our Mini Cylindrical Bolster is our most malleable and compact bolster option. Unlike our other cotton-filled bolster offerings, this mini bolster is filled with Canadian buckwheat hulls so that the prop can move, mold, and shape to your body. We intentionally filled this bolster to approximately 60% capacity (~2 lbs) to allow the hulls to hug around the back of the neck, under the seat/hips, or along the spine during practice.

This product is part of our Halfmoon Limited Edition Collection is a limited time offering showcasing Halfmoon's creative vision for that season. Carefully selecting patterns and prints allows us to bring to life modern, quality and current fabrics that will enhance and elevate your studio, home or zen space. Reinvigorate life into your meditation and yoga practice with these curated selections.


FEATURES

  • Dense, quality, handmade interior batting for longevity

  • Removable cover

  • Easy carry handle

  • Exceptional quality & durability


SPECS

  • 5.5" x 16" (14 cm x 41 cm)

  • Cover: 100% cottonÂ 

  • Casing: 100% cotton

  • Filling: natural Canadian buckwheat hulls

  • 2 lbs (0.91kg)

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover from the bolster. Machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle

  • Hang to dry

  • Do not bleach

  • Lint Removal Tip: wipe bolster with a latex-gloved hand or a lint roller


NOTES

  • During manufacturing, we reinforce the handles on our bolsters to ensure a strong seam.

  • Ripped seams may occur or be exaggerated from friction either when removing it from storage or how the bolster is carried to and from practice. Take extra care and be mindful of the delicacy of the product.

entry.title: Linen Mini Cylindrical Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mini Cylindrical 16"
Price: 55.00

Our Mini Cylindrical Bolster is our most malleable and compact bolster option. Unlike our other cotton-filled bolster offerings, this mini bolster is filled with Canadian buckwheat hulls so that the prop can move, mold, and shape to your body. We intentionally filled this bolster to approximately 60% capacity (~2 lbs) to allow the hulls to hug around the back of the neck, under the seat/hips, or along the spine during practice.

This product is part of our Halfmoon Premium Linen Collection and is a premium, timeless, and earth-friendly option within our textile lineup. With an elevated, yet artisanal aesthetic, you can invest in this luxurious fabric option in good-conscience. The low levels of water used to grow the flax plants in creating these fibres, make it much more earth-friendly than alternative fibres in the market. Bonus: Our linens not only have a soft hand feel and cooling properties but are also biodegradable!


FEATURES

  • Compact & malleable bolster

  • Small size for convenience and maneuverability

  • Multi-purpose for use in a variety of poses

  • Exceptional quality & durability

  • Removable & washable cover


SPECS

  • 5.5" x 16" (14 cm x 41 cm)

  • 2 lbs (0.91kgs)

  • Filled with natural Canadian buckwheat hulls

  • Cushions are filled by volume. Due to the natural differences in buckwheat, weight may vary by +/- 5%

  • Cover: 100% linen

  • 100% cotton casing made in India

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover from the bolster. Machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle

  • Hang to dry

  • Do not bleach

  • Lint Removal Tip: wipe bolster with a latex-gloved hand or a lint roller


NOTES

  • During manufacturing, we reinforce the handles on our bolsters to ensure a strong seam.

  • Ripped seams may occur or be exaggerated from friction when removing from storage or when carrying to and from practice. Take extra care and be mindful of the delicacy of the product.
